trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for designers for data views based on hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: 提供基本类，用于基于层次结构数据的数据视图的设计器。

trans-unit.source: This class must be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 必须继承此类。

trans-unit.source: The DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView class is used by developers of custom data source designers.
trans-unit.target: DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView 类的自定义数据源设计器的开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 启动的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner"></xref> that is the designer for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner"> </xref>即关联控件的设计器。

trans-unit.source: A unique path to the block of data to use for the view.
trans-unit.target: 一条唯一路径为要用于视图的数据块。

trans-unit.source: owner is -or- viewPath is .
trans-unit.target: owneris -or- viewPath is .

trans-unit.source: Gets the associated designer.
trans-unit.target: 获取关联的设计器。

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 父<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Generates design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control and returns a value indicating whether the data is sample or real data.
trans-unit.target: 生成设计时数据，与关联的数据源控件的架构匹配，并返回一个值，该值指示数据示例数据还是真实数据。

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeData method should provide a design-time version of data for use by the associated data-bound control designer.
trans-unit.target: GetDesignTimeData 方法应由关联的数据绑定控件设计器用于提供数据的设计时版本。

trans-unit.source: It is not expected nor recommended that the designer perform actual data access at design time.
trans-unit.target: 它不是预期，也建议设计器在设计时执行实际的数据访问。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the designer should create sample data that matches the schema of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 相反，设计器应创建的架构匹配的数据源的示例数据。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the returned data is sample data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate the returned data is live data.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示返回的数据是示例数据;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要指示返回的数据是实时数据。

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此实现始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the block of data that is presented in the view.
trans-unit.target: 获取视图中显示的数据块的路径。

trans-unit.source: The specific nature of the Path property is determined by the nature of the data.
trans-unit.target: 路径属性的特定性质取决于数据的性质。

trans-unit.source: For XML data, it would be an XPath query, but for other kinds of data it could be a URL or some other unique identifying path.
trans-unit.target: 对于 XML 数据，它将 XPath 查询，但对于其他类型的数据可能 URL 或某些其他唯一标识路径。

trans-unit.source: The path provided when creating the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供创建时的路径<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a schema that describes the data source view for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 获取描述关联控件的数据源视图的架构。

trans-unit.source: The Schema property allows the control designer of a data-bound control to provide intelligent choices based on the design-time data source view that is selected for data binding.
trans-unit.target: 架构属性允许控件设计器的数据绑定控件，以提供基于为数据绑定选择的设计时数据源视图的智能选项。

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此实现始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
